#summary common Prolog examples gambolized

Just some things to try out:

{{{
;;; Towers of Hanoi
(*- (move 1 ?x ?y ??)
    (lisp (format t "Move top disk from ~A to ~A.~%" '?x '?y)))
(*- (move ?n ?x ?y ?z)
    (lop (> ?n 1))
    (is ?m (lop (- ?n 1)))
    (move ?m ?x ?z ?y)
    (move 1 ?x ?y ??)
    (move ?m ?z ?y ?x))
(?- (move 3 left right center))
}}}
